item.title: One Man’s Quest to Keep Kids Away from Drugs
item.description: Rocky Herron, a former DEA agent, is convinced that it’s not enough to focus on the supply of drugs; we also have to change the demand.

item.title: Actually, We Need Less Empathy
item.description: This Western fixation has produced zany — and harmful — results that would be unthinkable in an ethical system that has stood the test of time.

item.title: Pam Bondi’s ‘Weaponization Working Group’ Will Come Back to Haunt the Trump DOJ
item.description: The Adams case is not the only one that will bring the foolishness of this directive into sharp relief.

item.title: Wheaton College Is Abandoning Its Conservative Alumni
item.description: The school’s bizarre de-congratulation of alumnus Russ Vought on his Trump administration appointment demonstrates how partial its ‘impartiality’ real...

item.title: Germanic Moods: Caspar David Friedrich at the Met
item.description: A first-rate survey of Romanticism’s sublime nature mystic.
